get.description: Retrieve complete layout of the organization, workspaces, user-groups, etc.

put.description: Sets complete layout of the organization, like workspaces, user-groups, etc.

get.description: Retrieve current model of the workspace in a declarative form.

put.description: Set complete layout of the workspace, like model, related ACLs, etc.

204.description: The model of the workspace was set.

get.description: Retrieve current logical model of the workspace in a declarative form.

put.description: Set effective logical model of the workspace.

get.description: Retrieve current analytics model of the workspace.

put.description: Set effective analytics model of the workspace.

post.description: Notification sets up all reports to be computed again with a new data.

204.description: An upload notification has been successfully registered.

404.description: Data source with given name does not exist.

get.description: Retrieves links for all options for different configurations.

get.summary: Get all available data source drivers
get.description: Retrieves a list of all supported data sources along with information about the used drivers.

200.description: A list of all available data source drivers.

get.description: Gets a basic information about the organization.

put.description: Sets a basic information about the organization.

204.description: A new info was successfully set.

delete.description: Completely remove and discontinue the organization.

description.example: Period to period comparison of revenues in main sectors.

analyticalDashboards.description: A list of analytical dashboards available in the model.

filterContexts.description: A list of filter contexts available in the model.

metrics.description: A list of metrics available in the model.

visualizationObjects.description: A list of visualization objects available in the model.

description.example: Customer name including the first and the last name.

tables.description: An array of physical database tables.

id.description: The Dataset ID. This ID is further used to refer to this instance of the dataset.

references.description: An array of references to other datasets.

sourceTable.description: A name of the source/originating table for the dataset from the physical data model.

DeclarativeDataset.description: A dataset defined by its properties.

granularities.description: An array of date granularities. All listed granularities will be available for date dataset.

description.example: A number of orders created by the customer - including all orders, even the non-delivered ones.

sourceColumn.description: A name of the source column in the table.

primary.description: A flag indicating whether the label should be treated as a primary one.

sourceColumn.description: A name of the source column in the table.

description.example: Sales for all the data available.

multivalue.description: The multi-value flag enables many-to-many cardinality for references.

sourceColumns.description: An array of source column names for a given reference.

description.example: Simple number for total goods in current production.

titleBase.description: Title base is used as a token in title pattern. If left empty, it is replaced by date dataset title.

titlePattern.description:
This pattern is used to generate the title of attributes and labels that result from the granularities.
There are two tokens available: 
* `%titleBase` - represents shared part by all titles, or title of Date Dataset if left empty
* `%granularityTitle` - represents `DateGranularity` built-in title

GranularitiesFormatting.description: A date dataset granularities title formatting rules.

JsonNode.description: A server agnostic definition of the visualization object in JSON format.

DeclarativeModel.description: A data model structured as a set of its attributes.

DeclarativeAnalytics.description: Entities describing users' view on data.

title.description: Object title for better UI naming.

Success.description: A JSON:API document with a single resource

self.description: A string containing the link's URL.

next.description: A string containing the link's URL for the next page of data.

includedResource.description: "Resource objects" appear in a JSON:API document to represent resources.

includedResourceAttributes.description: Members of the attributes object ("attributes") represent information about the resource object in which it's defined.

title.description: Object title for better UI naming.

relationshipToOne.description: References to other resource objects in a to-one ("relationship"). Relationships can be specified by including a member in a resource's links object.

relationshipToMany.description: An array of objects each containing "type" and "id" members for to-many relationships.

self.description: A string containing the link's URL.

links.description: Links to all relevant objects on current path.
